Pr\u00e9requis: Etre inscrit au Mastère Spécialisé "Infrastructure Project Finance"
Objectifs du module: To give participants a comprehensive view of leverage finance through LBO
Programme du module: Contents - Key concept in acquisitions (price, contours) - How to analyse leveraged acquisitions and buy out (financial analysis, cash flows, risk factors) - How to optimise capital/debt structure - What are the different providers of equity? - What are the different providers of loan and bond finance? - Impact of using different debt and equity instruments (distress cases, legal impact....) Course with examples, case studies Qualité de l'exposé 50% et Cas pratiques 50%
